TextBlock.Text: SACCO: This is a terrible sight... If the picture is correct, the only one who survived was the king. They couldn't win even with this cannon. It's a sight I don't really want Cumin to see...I wonder if she's okay.
CUMIN: After the light from this rod finishes spreading, the way you see things changes! There's a delay of about one second... I think?
CUMIN: ...Wait, up! Look at the sky!
MENTH: Sky? There's nothing there...? ...Ah, I see, that's what it means.
